title: Suluban Beach Adventure (Half-day)
overview: Explore the hidden Suluban Beach, accessed via stairs through limestone cliffs. Ideal for surfers and photographers.

stops.description: Descend the stairs to the beach, explore sea caves, and enjoy the surf.
Have a snack or drink with ocean views.

title: Suluban Surf & Explore (Full-day)
overview: A day of surfing, sea cave exploration, and cliffside relaxation at Suluban Beach.

stops.description: Surf or explore the unique sea caves and rock formations.
